name: Fort Knight
description:
Your dad asked you to find a treasure for him.

Your brother died in a fight with your dad, but he refuses to move on.  All the emotion makes him violent.

But you're not a killer knight. Don't you ?

A crazy mashup of Mario and Undertale  made for the MASHUP JAM.

Credits :

fledered : Code, Design

JapanGuy : Art

jtn191 : Sounds Effects, Music (Menu, Credits)

SLG : Music (Gameplay, Battle, Menu)

uncookedtoast : Art
